pageContext.claim: “She’s [Nancy Pelosi] being controlled by the radical left, which is a problem. And you know, she’s under total control of the radical left. I think that’s a very bad thing for her. I think it’s a very bad thing for the Democrats.”
pageContext.analysis: House Speaker Pelosi is actually well-known for knowing exactly the center of the House Democratic caucus, which has made her an effective leader. Trump's problem is that his proposed wall is rejected by virtually every Democrat on the political spectrum.
